workshop_activity.intro_text: This is the introduction text of the welcome together.

read.slide_text_1: This is the text on the first slide.
read.slide_text_2: This is the text on the second slide.
read.slide_text_3: This is the text on the third slide.

talk_together.discussion_text: This text describes what should be discussed.

question_time.answer_list_1: First combo box answer; Second combo box answer
question_time.reply_1: This text shows up when you've selected an answer.
question_time.answer_list_2: name:answer_1 | text: First answer; name:answer_2 | text:Second answer
question_time.reply_2: This text shows up when you've selected or typed an answer.

welcome_individual.reply_happy: This text appears when selecting the happy emoji.
welcome_individual.reply_ok: This text appears when selecting the ok emoji.
welcome_individual.reply_sad: This text appears when selecting the sad emoji.
